Meet the same issue.

Java Version:
java version "1.8.0_231"
Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.8.0_231-b11)
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (build 25.231-b11, mixed mode)

RocketMQ version:
rocketmq-4.7.1


Interesting things below:
```java
        at io.netty.util.concurrent.SingleThreadEventExecutor$2.run(SingleThreadEventExecutor.java:140) ~[netty-all-4.0.42.Final.jar:4.0.42.Final]
        ... 1 common frames omitted

        ... 19 common frames omitted

2020-07-15 15:40:06 INFO ShutdownHook - Shutdown hook over, consuming total time(ms): 4585
2020-07-15 15:42:55 INFO main - rocketmqHome=/Users/xiaoneng/webserver/rocketmq-all-4.7.1-source-release/distribution/target/rocketmq-4.7.1/rocketmq-4.7.1

2020-07-15 15:42:55 INFO main - brokerId=0
```

After many Exceptions, the broker restart itself. **The important Thing** is that the broker register successfully and no Exception throws.
```java
2020-07-15 15:56:06 INFO brokerOutApi_thread_4 - register broker[0]to name server 10.30.127.220:9876 OK
2020-07-15 15:56:36 INFO brokerOutApi_thread_1 - register broker[0]to name server 10.30.127.220:9876 OK

2020-07-15 15:57:06 INFO BrokerControllerScheduledThread1 - Slave fall behind master: 0 bytes
2020-07-15 15:57:06 INFO brokerOutApi_thread_2 - register broker[0]to name server 10.30.127.220:9876 OK
2020-07-15 15:57:36 INFO brokerOutApi_thread_3 - register broker[0]to name server 10.30.127.220:9876 OK
2020-07-15 15:58:06 INFO BrokerControllerScheduledThread1 - dispatch behind commit log 0 bytes
2020-07-15 15:58:06 INFO BrokerControllerScheduledThread1 - Slave fall behind master: 0 bytes
2020-07-15 15:58:06 INFO brokerOutApi_thread_4 - register broker[0]to name server 10.30.127.220:9876 OK
2020-07-15 15:58:36 INFO brokerOutApi_thread_1 - register broker[0]to name server 10.30.127.220:9876 OK
```

Issues are generally used for bug reports and feature requests, so if you have any questions about     Apache  RocketMQ, it is recommended to discuss it on the mailing list first, the mailing list [address]    (https://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact). I will close the Issue first, but please feel free to     reopen it if you have any other issues.
Cool, I saw you already submitted a commit for this issue.  Would you like to submit a PR for us to review ? Thanks ~

ok. I've found the solution
I did a load balancing in front of 2 namesrv. It's not because of this, is it?

Frankly speaking, we have no such intention. If you have some actual business concerns, open a discussion on the Dev mailing list. What benefit does that for your business? Maybe there are a handful of voices in the community.
Use Ali Cloud's load balancer to do tcp layer 4 switching namesrv
Plz create an issue to link this pr.
Plz create an issue to link this pr.
I've had this problem, too. Have you solved it?
@writegull 上述设置对于一个新的订阅组才会起作用，当然如果对应topic消息比较少，都在内存中，为了尽最大努力消费，也会从头开始的，最好还是通过[邮件列表](https://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact/)的方式来提问

@zhangjidi2016 @Aaron-He  You can review this pr, please.Thanks.

> Hello, we need more information for us to investigate why it was deleted. Usually commitLog will only be deleted automatically by the compaction/retention mechanism. It might be possible that someone deleted the second file by mistake, and you can verify this by Linux auditing tools (like find out the commands executed, other logging info). If it is not human error then we might need you to reproduce this bug before we can dig further into it.

We don't delete it artificially. Is it when the system load is high? The jar version we used is 1.2.2.2, which is older
I will close the Issue first, but please feel free to reopen it if you have any other issues.

a producer can send messages for all topics in the cluster. mostly ONE producer enough, but there can be a lot of CONSUMERs to consuming topics. thread-safe-start or non-thread-safe-start must be thought. synchronize-start or non-synchronize-start is so import for them.

> Since there is no direct documentation about this,I would assume DefaultMQProducerImpl#start() should be synchronized.

thanks

@duhenglucky Thx,I have fixed it.

The last build is success.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/62043001/88249682-c26a4200-ccd7-11ea-90ca-1ed60ee6a3cd.png)

您好。两个问题
1. 当节点掉线重新加入集群，Pull 模式下，offset 被至0. 而不是重置到 broker offset. 
2. 这类问题发生时，是否有允许手动指定 某topic 下分区的 offset. 因为尽管下游做了幂等，会因消息重复数据量过大，下游消费不及时而引发客诉。
Can you submit a PR to fix this issue? @zhangjidi2016

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5010883/88256979-42e86d00-ccef-11ea-99fd-d6e925a5946a.png)

You should check the reason why your CI test cases failed carefully.

> ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5010883/88256979-42e86d00-ccef-11ea-99fd-d6e925a5946a.png)
> 
> You should check the reason why your CI test cases failed carefully.

So that's it . I think build success means success before. So ignore the unapproved files~~

嗯，认同您所描述的。但日志提示以下信息。
```yaml 
2020-07-19 10:45:46 INFO PullMessageThread_16 - the request offset: 30292 over flow badly, broker max offset: 30291, consumer: /consumer03
2020-07-19 10:45:46 WARN PullMessageThread_11 - PULL_OFFSET_MOVED:correction offset. topic=example_topic, groupId=example_group_info, requestOffset=30266, newOffset=0, suggestBrokerId=0
```
是因为consumer 没有设置 类似 `auto_offset_reset:(earliest| latest| none | )`

if "you want to customize your logic" || streaming
     use Pull Consumer 
if "lazy to do mq things" 
    try DefaultPushConsumer 

ps: how to handle logic like "PULL_OFFSET_MOVED:correction",  check push consumer's codes.

There are two levels of retries when sending asynchronously. The 'retryTime' in the outer layer is 1, and the 'retryTime' in the inner layer is retryTimesWhenSendAsyncFailed.
When the broker is down, the producer cannot go to the inner retry logic, so the retryTimesWhenSendAsyncFaild does not work.

The above retry logic can be seen in DefaultMQProducerImpl#sendDefaultImpl, MQClientAPIImpl#sendMessageAsync
